on reading compounds: 蝋管【ロウカン】phonograph wax cylinder, phonograph cylinder
藍蝋【アイロウ】indigo wax, cylindrical shape made from indigo dye froth, often by boiling the froth with caustic soda, used for coloring paintings, etc.
イボタ蝋【イボタロウ】tree wax, insect wax, Chinese wax
kun reading compounds: ろうそく立て【ろうそくたて】candle holder
